Content.Text:
Today is Fritz's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, look at all the food for dinner today! Wait,
is this all for me? Could it be...a surprise
birthday party?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wowzers, thanks! Man, I'm so happy. This is the
best!
<PAGE>
Now, it'd be a real shame if we let this food get
cold, so we'd better hurry and dig in! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmmmmm-mmm! I'm stuffed. That was really
good!

Fritz looks really happy. What should I say to
him?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You did all this just because you wanted to see
me happy? D'awww, I-I'm feelin' all bashful now!
<PAGE>
Man, I'm really loved, aren't I? I-it's bringin' a
little tear to my eye. Thanks so much,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, Papa!

Yay! He was really happy to hear that. Let's
throw him another great party next year!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? Oh, uh, thanks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Hey, um, <MYNAME>? Is it just me, or did that
sound a little...underwhelmed?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought Mama sounded cold, too. Poor Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, poor Papa!

Oops! I don't think that came out right. I told
him I meant it sincerely, but he still felt hurt. I
guess I shouldn't have said it in the first place...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Aww, shucks. I love you, too!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I hope we stay together and love each other
forever, even when we're old and wrinkled and
get excited about high-fiber snacks.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
I wanna be lovey-dovey too, 'cuz I love Mama
and Papa lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Me, too! I love Mama and Papa super-lots!
Happy birthday, Papa!

Happy birthday, Fritz. Here's to many, many
more wonderful years together.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Wait...<MYNAME>, are you saying that throwing
this party for me was a pain and it wore you
out? Man, that's enough to bum even me out.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww, is Mama going to sleep? Can't we all
stay up more? This is fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. And Papa looks all sad now. That wasn't a
nice thing to say, Mama.

Oh no, I made him sad. I apologized and he
understood, but still, I should've been more
sensitive.

Today is Klaus's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, would you look at this! You've certainly
prepared a real feast today.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? A birthday party for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So that's why! Thank you, <MYNAME>. It looks
delicious. Come, let's eat before it goes cold.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Making such an abundance of my favorite
dishes must have taken a lot of effort. Thank
you. I enjoyed every last bite.

Klaus looks really happy. What should I say to
him?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? If you like this expression, I'd be glad to
show it to you whenever you like. In fact, I can
even give you a close-up, if you'd like.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heh heh. No need to turn so red. If every
birthday is going to be this pleasant, I won't
mind turning a year older as much.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, Papa!

Yay! He was really happy to hear that. Let's
throw him another great party next year!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh. Though I have to say, that sounded a
little...impersonal. If you're that tired, you ought
to get some rest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I'm sorry the festivities gave you so much extra
work, on top of your normal chores.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought Mama sounded cold, too. Poor Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, poor Papa!

Oops! I don't think that came out right. I told
him I meant it sincerely, but he still felt hurt. I
guess I shouldn't have said it in the first place...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Wh-where did that come from? Er...I-I love you
too, of course. Very, very much.
<PAGE>
I look forward to spending many wonderful years
with you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
I wanna be lovey-dovey too, 'cuz I love Mama
and Papa lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Me, too! I love Mama and Papa super-lots!
Happy birthday, Papa!

Happy birthday, Klaus. Here's to many, many
more wonderful years together.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>. I know you don't mean any
unkindness by that, but it was a careless thing
to say.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww, is Mama going to sleep? Can't we all
stay up more? This is fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. And Papa looks all sad now. That wasn't a
nice thing to say, Mama.

Oh no, I made him sad. I apologized and he
understood, but still, I should've been more
sensitive.

Today is Raeger's birthday! Let's make his
favorite foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh...? Not to jump to conclusions, but
umm...is all this food for a birthday party for
me?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, thought so. Thanks, <MYNAME>! I love it.
<PAGE>
C'mon, let's dig in. It all looks so delicious!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm, that was some grade-A cookin'! I'm so
lucky to have married someone who's always
thinking of me like this.

Raeger looks really happy. What should I say to
him?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What, you threw this great party for me just so
you could see me smile?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hey now, are you trying to overload my senses
with cuteness?. I'm falling for you harder by the
minute.
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. This was the best birthday
I've ever had.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, Papa!

Yay! He was really happy to hear that. Let's
throw him another great party next year!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wow, that sounded kinda...unenthused.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Guess doing all this cooking must've killed any
other plans you might've had for the day. Sorry.
Go get some rest, okay?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought Mama sounded cold, too. Poor Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, poor Papa!

Oops! I don't think that came out right. I told
him I meant it sincerely, but he still felt hurt. I
guess I shouldn't have said it in the first place...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you, too. I hope we get to spend a lot
more birthdays together like this, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
I wanna be lovey-dovey too, 'cuz I love Mama
and Papa lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Me, too! I love Mama and Papa super-lots!
Happy birthday, Papa!

Happy birthday, Raeger. Here's to many, many
more wonderful years together.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whoa, hold up. Is it just me, or does it feel like
you only threw this party out of familial duty?
<PAGE>
I'm sorry you went through all that on my behalf.
If you're that tired, you should go get some
sleep.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww, is Mama going to sleep? Can't we all
stay up more? This is fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. And Papa looks all sad now. That wasn't a
nice thing to say, Mama.

Oh no, I made him sad. I apologized and he
understood, but still, I should've been more
sensitive.

Today is Mistel's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, I suspected you might be cooking up
something like this, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
This is a birthday party for me, isn't it?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're so considerate. Come, let's dig in before it
goes cold.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was delicious. Thank you, <MYNAME>.
This lovely party has made today an excellent
birthday.

Mistel looks really happy. What should I say to
him?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You threw this party just so that you could see
me look happy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Goodness, you always say the most adorable
things. You really have no shortage of qualities
that keep me enamored.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha ha! Papa and Mama're all lovey-dovey! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, Papa!

Yay! He was really happy to hear that. Let's
throw him another great party next year!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That was hardly a flattering response. It sounded
almost...impersonal, I'd say.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Well...we are technically two unrelated
individuals, bound only by marriage. Perhaps I
was selfish to force my feelings on you.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought Mama sounded cold, too. Poor Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, poor Papa!

Oops! I don't think that came out right. I told
him I meant it sincerely, but he still felt hurt. I
guess I shouldn't have said it in the first place...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
And I love you, too. Very, very much.
<PAGE>
May there be many more warm and happy
birthdays like this in our future.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
I wanna be lovey-dovey too, 'cuz I love Mama
and Papa lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Me, too! I love Mama and Papa super-lots!
Happy birthday, Papa!

Happy birthday, Mistel. Here's to many, many
more wonderful years together.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I realize you may have meant no
offense, but no matter how one looks at it, that
wasn't an appropriate thing to say right now.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww, is Mama going to sleep? Can't we all
stay up more? This is fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. And Papa looks all sad now. That wasn't a
nice thing to say, Mama.

Oh no, I made him sad. I apologized and he
understood, but still, I should've been more
sensitive.

Today is Nadi's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You sure made a lot of food today. What's
the occasion?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wha?! M-my birthday?! Oh...right. Now I
remember.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for thinking of me. Let's eat.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm. Everything was great. Thanks,
<MYNAME>.

Nadi looks really happy. What should I say to
him?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? What look? H-hey! Stop staring at me.
<PAGE>
Sheesh. This is supposed to be my birthday, but
you're the one who looks happy enough to
burst.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But y'know...it's actually not bad. I'm, uh...r-
really glad we got married.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, Papa!

Yay! He was really happy to hear that. Let's
throw him another great party next year!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Uh, thanks? I guess? Still, that was
kinda...bland, considering how you usually are.
You tired or something? Ah well.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought Mama sounded cold, too. Poor Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, poor Papa!

Oops! I don't think that came out right. I told
him I meant it sincerely, but he still felt hurt. I
guess I shouldn't have said it in the first place...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Bwah?! H-hey! Why do you keep saying that out
loud? P-people can hear you!
<PAGE>
Sheesh. I, uh...I do love you too, y'know. So,
um, here's to lots more years together. And, um,
lots of happiness too.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
I wanna be lovey-dovey too, 'cuz I love Mama
and Papa lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Me, too! I love Mama and Papa super-lots!
Happy birthday, Papa!

Happy birthday, Nadi. Here's to many, many
more wonderful years together.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You are? Really. Sorry I ended up making all that
extra work for you today.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww, is Mama going to sleep? Can't we all
stay up more? This is fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. And Papa looks all sad now. That wasn't a
nice thing to say, Mama.

Oh no, I made him sad. I apologized and he
understood, but still, I should've been more
sensitive.

Today is Kamil's birthday! Let's make his favorite
foods and throw a party for him! ♪

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. <MYNAME>...is this all for my birthday?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks. I haven't even taken a bite yet and I love
it already. C'mon, let's eat while it's still hot.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm, that was some first-rate cooking. Thanks
for throwing such a great party.

Kamil looks really happy. What should I say to
him?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? O-oh, I, er, didn't realize what I looked like,
so I have no idea what to say...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But anyway! Thanks a lot for that great party.
<PAGE>
If me being happy makes you smile, there's no
better present I could've asked for. This has been
my happiest birthday ever.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, Papa!

Yay! He was really happy to hear that. Let's
throw him another great party next year!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Um...<MYNAME>? Were you even listening to
me?
<PAGE>
You sounded really distant and far away. If you're
really that tired, you should probably get some
shut-eye.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought Mama sounded cold, too. Poor Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, poor Papa!

Oops! I don't think that came out right. I told
him I meant it sincerely, but he still felt hurt. I
guess I shouldn't have said it in the first place...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
And I love you, too. I hope we get to spend
many more birthdays together like this.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Papa and Mama are all lovey-dovey! ♪
I wanna be lovey-dovey too, 'cuz I love Mama
and Papa lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Me, too! I love Mama and Papa super-lots!
Happy birthday, Papa!

Happy birthday, Kamil. Here's to many, many
more wonderful years together.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
If you're that tired, you didn't have to do all this
just to throw a party for me. If it's this big a
hassle, don't do it next year.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww, is Mama going to sleep? Can't we all
stay up more? This is fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. And Papa looks all sad now. That wasn't a
nice thing to say, Mama.

Oh no, I made him sad. I apologized and he
understood, but still, I should've been more
sensitive.

Today is Elise's birthday! Let's make her favorite
foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, you truly seem to have gone the extra mile
with today's meal.
<PAGE>
Wait a moment...is this all meant to be a
birthday celebration for me?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
O-oh...I'm touched. Really. I'm very happy. Well
then, we should eat before it gets cold.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was delicious. Thank you, <MYNAME>.
You've made today a lovely birthday for me.

Elise looks really happy. What should I say to
her?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wh-what. Wh-why are you grinning from ear to
ear over one simple little smile from me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>N-not that it's a bad thing, honestly. But it feels
embarrassing to have you stare at me like that!
S-stop it this instant.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Mama and Papa are all lovey-dovey! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, Mama!

Hooray! She was really happy to hear that. Let's
throw her another great party next year!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Goodness, that certainly sounded rather dry. I'm
not saying it was cold, per se, but couldn't you
have put more heart into it?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought Papa sounded cold, too. Poor Mama!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, poor Mama!

Oops! I don't think that came out right. I told her
I meant it sincerely, but she still felt hurt. I guess
I shouldn't have said it in the first place...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wh-what?! Where did that come from?
Goodness! Of all the surprises... But, erm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I, ah...I love you too. Thank you for today.
Moments like these are precious to me. I'm glad
I married you.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Mama and Papa are all lovey-dovey! ♪
I wanna be lovey-dovey too, 'cuz I love Mama
and Papa lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Me, too! I love Mama and Papa super-lots!
Happy birthday, Mama!

Happy birthday, Elise. Here's to many, many
more wonderful years together.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Are you saying throwing this celebration was
nothing but a tiring chore? I see. Enough, then.
Off to bed with you.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww, is Papa going to sleep? Can't we all stay
up more? This is fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. And Mama looks all sad now. That wasn't
a nice thing to say, Papa.

Oh no, I made her sad. I apologized and she
understood, but still, I should've been more
sensitive.

Today is Iris's birthday! Let's make her favorite
foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh, look at all the delicious food. Did you
prepare all this for my birthday?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Why thank you! I love it already. Come on, it
would be a waste to let it all go cold, so let's
eat.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm so lucky to have
someone put this much thought and effort into
throwing a birthday party for me.
Iris looks really happy. What should I say to her?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Goodness, <MYNAME>. I see you still have that
loveable habit of saying such cute,
heartwarming things so casually.
<PAGE>
Even now that we're married, you still manage to
make my heart skip a beat. Thank you for today;
it was wonderful. I love you.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Mama and Papa are all lovey-dovey! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, Mama!

Hooray! She was really happy to hear that. Let's
throw her another great party next year!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well, that sounded rather rote...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It was almost as if you didn't care to hear the
opinion of the person you spent all that time
preparing food for.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I thought Papa sounded cold, too. Poor Mama!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, poor Mama!

Oops! I don't think that came out right. I told her
I meant it sincerely, but she still felt hurt. I guess
I shouldn't have said it in the first place...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ohoho! Well, isn't that sudden. I love you too, of
course.
<PAGE>
Ever since we were married, every day has been
bliss. I hope we'll have many more wonderful
years together like this, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hahaha! Mama and Papa are all lovey-dovey! ♪
I wanna be lovey-dovey too, 'cuz I love Mama
and Papa lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Me, too! I love Mama and Papa super-lots!
Happy birthday, Mama!

Happy birthday, Iris. Here's to many, many more
wonderful years together.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>...
I understand you've been working hard, but try
to think about your timing.
<PAGE>
Now you've gone and dampened the lovely
atmosphere of the party.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww, is Papa going to sleep? Can't we all stay
up more? This is fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah. And Mama looks all sad now. That wasn't
a nice thing to say, Papa.

Oh no, I made her sad. I apologized and she
understood, but still, I should've been more
sensitive.

Today is Lillie's birthday! Let's make her favorite
foods and throw a party for her! ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh! So many favorite foods all in one place!
Waaaaait a minute...is this for my birthday...?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>! I'm sooo happy right now!
C'mon, let's eat before it gets cold.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm! Everything was so yummy! Thanks,
<MYNAME>. This was so fantastic of you, really.
I loved it.

Lillie looks really happy. What should I say to
her?
That's the look I wanted to see!
Well, glad you liked it.
I love you!
I'm tired. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>...I, um...I-I...
<PAGE>
When you say something like that with such a
big smile on your face, I don't even know how
to reply...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
